department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description:
Jug, stirrup handle, painted.with a design of two running messengers, in full regalia, carrying weapons and wearing elaborate puma-head helmets.  The area between the warriors is filled with the spreading wints fanning out behind each body.  The design is in rust red on a cream slip, and the red is used on a series of double lines decorating the spout and the stirrup handle.  Handle repaired.

Something inside of jug, perhaps loose debris.
title: Vessel
